name: Rybbit
tagline: Open Source Google Analytics Replacement
description: Refreshingly straightforward web analytics â€” open source and GDPR-compliant. Comes with funnels, goals, custom events, geolocation, web vitals, session replay, powerful filters, and error tracking. 9k Github Stars.

name: TinyFast
tagline: Fast File Size Reducer Tool for MacOS
description: TinyFast is a macOS app that compresses PNG, JPEG, MP4, MOV, PDF, and GIF files locally. Just drag and drop your file in and out. Itâ€™s fast, private, and built for developers, designers, and creators who care about security and speed.

description: Create beautiful link-in-bio pages with infinite grid layouts. The unique alternative to traditional link trees.

description: Make cheap international calls from your web browser, iPhone, or Android device. Pay-as-you-go rates to 200+ countries. No subscriptions or hidden fees.

description: Compyle is the first coding agent that actually keeps you in the driverâ€™s seat throughout the entire process - asking you questions and thinking with you, so you can stay in control of the architecture and direction, while it handles the mechanical execution.

name: Jarts.io
tagline: See & improve how AI talks about your Company
description: We saw two issues with existing AI-SEO Tools: Still no one knew how to optimize + high-priced for just a quick check. We solved both. - Immediate AI Visibility check (no signup, no paywall). - Sub for deeper insights and targeted content optimization

name: OneRemoteJobs

name: Islam360
tagline: https://theislam360.com/
description: Islam360 is a complete Islamic platform that lets users read, search, and understand the Quran and Hadith with authentic translations and tafsir. Itâ€™s available on web and mobile, helping Muslims learn and connect with Islam easily.

name: FlowTrip - AI Group Trip Planner App
tagline: Planning Oktoberfest, Music Festival or a Team Offsite?
description: FlowTrip is the first travel app which uses AI on each and every stage of planning: from building your itinerary by just uploading screenshots to using smart notifications during the trip to notify you that it will start raining so you go to a cafe nearby.

name: Deuce
tagline: Gambling addiction recovery - smart transaction monitoring
description: Smart transaction monitoring system assisting compulsive gamblers and their loved ones rebuild trust while keeping healthy boundaries in place.

name: Find My Moat
tagline: A massive collection of 200+ investing tools ðŸ’°

name: MiniDocuments v2
tagline: Tech learning, simplified - in minutes, not hours.
description: MiniDocuments v2 - New Look, New Pricing & Suggestion Box Explore short, step-by-step PDF tutorials covering AI, coding, app building, and productivity â€” now with a cleaner design, simpler pricing, and a new Suggestion Box to share what you want next.

name: braindead
tagline: dont end up braindead
description: braindead is a drop dead adorable screen time app. save your brain (and companion) from decay by staying off your phone and compete with friends who dare disconnect. happy to be sponsoring trinity safh this month!

name: Chitthi
tagline: Send emails without limits. Self-hosted. Dev-friendly.
description: Chitthi is an open-source, self-hosted email API built in Golang. No lock-in. No per-email fees. Just plug in your own provider (like Breevo or Mailersend) and start sending. Tracks logs in Postgres, optionally uses Redis. Dev-first. Docker-ready.
